titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Timothy Dwight College, Yale University, Records of the Master
Timothy Dwight College, Yale University, Records of the Master
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:16

did.unittitle: Timothy Dwight College, Yale University, records of the master

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of memoranda to fellows, Social Activities Committee records, and student records for the Classes of 1936-1971 maintained by the master of Timothy Dwight College, Yale University.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 13-G-2 (YRG 13-G-2), Records of the master of Timothy Dwight College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details. Accession 2018-A-0045 is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Timothy Dwight College, Yale Universit, Records of the Master (RU 820). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of memoranda to fellows, Social Activities Committee records, and student records for the Classes of 1936-1971 maintained by the master of Timothy Dwight College, Yale University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The title "Master" for chief executive officers of residential colleges was changed to "Head of College" in April of 2016.

did.unittitle: Administrative and student records of the master
Student lists, including military service status
Recommendation letters of Charles H. Sawyer
"Alumni Directory: Timothy Dwight College in Yale University"
"The Weathervane of Timothy Dwight College in Yale University: Class of 1944"
Deane Keller while in the Army
Newsletters to former Timothy Dwight students in the military services
Health Department seminars: Problems of the Yale Student
Music - Timothy Dwight College - Glee Club (Grunyons), programs, songs, etc.
Photographs of portraits of Frederick A. Godley and James Grafton Rogers by Deane Keller
Dramatics -- Timothy Dwight College - J. Stephen Knight in charge
The Master with himself (poems by C. Bergin)
Encyclopedia of Timothy Dwight College -material compiled by George Allen
"The Three Gifts of Christmas: A Meditation," by Charles Garside, Jr.
"The Chubb Fellowship in Timothy Dwight College"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Items include photographs, articles, clippings, correspondence, songs, and drawings.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
